job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: pYou are a talented Java Developer with a passion for great code This Atlanta based company is still sorting out their postpandemic logistics but this role should be fully remote for the foreseeable future This role would challenge you to leverage your problem solving skills to work on new and interesting challenges across both new development and support and well being of existing applications ppbrppThis role will work on various cloud platforms but primarily on GCP They dont require GCP to get started but your knowledge on deploying and working with cloud is going to be helpful ppbrppYour experience working with API development and microservices is certainly going to be helpful in this role as well as there is a heavy backend component to work on this team ppnbspppstrongTop 35 Skillsetsstrongpulli35 years of Java development experienceliliExperience building APIs or microservicesliulpnbspppstrongPreferred SkillsetsstrongpulliCloud knowledgeliliModern JavaScript frameworks ReactAngularliulpbrppemEqual Opportunity EmployerVeteransDisabled To read our Candidate Privacy Information Statement which explains how we will use your information please visit httpswwwmodiscomenuscandidateprivacy The Company will consider qualified applicants with arrest and conviction recordsemp
